subject: DNM: Make sure protection tests protect against policy regressions

values.-1: This patch needs further work before it can be merged
values.+1: Looks good to me, but someone else must approve

Patch Set 1:

Failed test are here - https://storage.gra.cloud.ovh.net/v1/AUTH_dcaab5e32b234d56b626f72581e3644c/zuul_opendev_logs_946/778609/1/check/glance-secure-rbac-protection-functional/946d5e9/testr_results.html

Proving the new tests offer some level of protection against authorization regressions.

I can propose another DNM that modifies the authorization code in the database to make sure these tests also protect against that, if it's helpful. But I also want to be conscious of gate resources.

Abandoned

I never intended this to merge, just proving that the new protection jobs are useful in protecting against authorization regressions.
